# Marmalade (drag queen)

(DEATH date then BIRTH date) -->

Marmalade is the stage name of Jack Bourton, a Welsh drag performer who competed on the sixth series of RuPaul's Drag Race UK.
Career
Marmalade is a drag performer and clothing designer. She competed on the sixth series of RuPaul's Drag Race UK'' and had previously designed clothes for other drag performers including series 3 contestant Victoria Scone. Marmalade showcased her Welsh background on the series' first episode. She won her first main challenge on the eighth episode.
Personal life
Marmalade is based in Cardiff. Marmalade uses the pronouns she/her in drag and he/him out of drag. Tia Kofi and Victoria Scone have been described as Marmalade's "drag mother" and "drag grandmother", respectively. Marmalade's mother Deborah appeared in the eighth episode of Drag Race.
